description: Complete system overview with architecture, key components, and high-level data flow between the core modules (io-formats, ingestion, core-domain, datastore, services)
Comprehensive documentation of the core domain models including Quest, Chapter, Task, Reward, LootTable structures and their relationships within the core-domain module
Detailed documentation of the item catalog extraction, processing and version management system, including the ItemCatalogExtractor algorithm and VersionCatalog implementation
Documentation of the JSON serialization/deserialization workflows, custom ObjectMapper configurations, and data format specifications for quest files and loot tables
Documentation of the validation framework including BrokenReferenceValidator, LootWeightsValidator, and RequiredFieldsValidator implementations and their integration points
